["$r",null,null,{"children":[["$r","p",null,{"children":"Termux 第三方软件源，包含 gcc、R 语言和许多游戏"}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"使用说明","children":"使用说明"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"添加 apt 存储库"}],"
",["$r","SyntaxHighlight",null,{"code":"wget -qO- https://its-pointless.github.io/setup-pointless-repo.sh | bash","language":"bash"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"使用镜像"}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"echo "deb {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/24 termux extras" > $PREFIX/etc/apt/sources.list.d/pointless.list","codeLanguage":"bash"}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"相关链接","children":"相关链接"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://github.com/its-pointless/gcc_termux","rel":"nofollow","children":"https://github.com/its-pointless/gcc_termux"}]}]]}]

meta.title: Termux Its Pointless 软件仓库镜像使用帮助
